text: Poovizhi Raja is a 1988 Indian Tamil-language film directed by Santhana Bharathi. The film stars Prabhu and Nishanti in the lead role. == Plot == A man asks the former managing director of his company to recommend his son for the position. But when he refuses, he resorts to unfair means. == Cast == From the opening credits: * Prabhu * Ramki * Nishanti * Vijayakumar * Vinu Chakravarthy * Subha * Shabnam == Production == Poovizhi Raja was directed by Santhana Bharathi and produced by M. Gopi under S. M. Arts. The story was written by Shanmugasundaram. Cinematography was handled by A. Suresh Kumaar, and the editing by V. Rajagopal. == Soundtrack == The soundtrack was composed by Yuvaraj. == Release == Poovizhi Raja was released on 8 November 1988. == References == == External links == * Category:1980s Tamil-language films Category:Indian films Category:Films directed by Santhana Bharathi
title: Poovizhi Raja
